医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
蛋白质基因组学揭示了克服急性髓系白血病耐药性的新靶点医生有近十几种新的靶向药物来治疗急性髓系白血病（AML）患者，但四分之三的患者仍会在五年内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Proteogenomics-reveals-new-target-for-beating-drug-resistance-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Proteogenomics-reveals-new-target-for-beating-drug-resistance-in-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7b34dad-ac57-47e0-abe0-885149b95e37 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:13:18 -0500 Proteogenomics reveals new target for beating drug resistance in acute myeloid leukemia
研究揭示羊毛硫抗生素防腐剂对肠道微生物组的影响食品制造商经常在食品中添加防腐剂以保持新鲜。这些防腐剂的主要目的是杀死可能分解或破坏食物的微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-reveals-impact-of-lantibiotic-preservatives-on-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Study-reveals-impact-of-lantibiotic-preservatives-on-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed4c4b26-0ea9-468e-a386-8da1305fd78f Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:08:47 -0500 Study reveals impact of lantibiotic preservatives on gut microbiome
Engrailed-1蛋白促进胰腺癌进展和转移胰腺癌是美国癌症相关死亡的第三大原因，只有 12% 的患者在诊断后五年内存活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Engrailed-1- Protein-promotes-pancreatic-cancer-progression-and-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Engrailed-1- Protein-promotes-pancreatic-cancer-progression-and-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db75f492-e3fc-4f12-bf31-25995af4458d Fri, 02 Feb 2024 23:03:52 -0500 Engrailed-1 protein promotes pancreatic cancer progression and metastasis
韦尔奇基金会拨款支持 UTA 耐药结核病研究韦尔奇基金会拨款 30 万美元，支持德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的研究，探究为什么某些类型的结核分枝杆菌 (Mtb)（导致肺结核 (TB) 的细菌）对治疗没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Welch-Foundation-grant-supports-UTA-research-on-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Welch-Foundation-grant-supports-UTA-research-on-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=538302e4-e3b2-4f13-af3a-847b8b49039c Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:48:24 -0500 Welch Foundation grant supports UTA research on drug-resistant tuberculosis
NAEC 制定更新指南以提高严重癫痫患者的护理质量全国癫痫中心协会 (NAEC) 制定了更新的指南，概述了癫痫中心应提供的综合服务和资源，以提高癫痫未得到良好控制的患者的护理质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/NAEC-develops-updated-guidelines-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-people-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/NAEC-develops-updated-guidelines-to-improve-quality-of-care-for-people-with-severe-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4104c4b-db91-4e4a-aebd-a8126857cfdb Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:47:39 -0500 NAEC develops updated guidelines to improve quality of care for people with severe epilepsy
西部山区引进单端口机器人，用于治疗头颈外科癌症患者犹他大学亨斯曼癌症研究所自豪地推出了西部山区第一个也是唯一一个用于头颈肿瘤外科患者的单端口机器人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Single-port-robot-introduced-in-the-Mountain-West-for-head-and-neck-surgical-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Single-port-robot-introduced-in-the-Mountain-West-for-head-and-neck-surgical-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=246c3f19-915e-423e-9822-453c37aaff79 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:40:54 -0500 Single-port robot introduced in the Mountain West for head and neck surgical cancer patients
揭开艾滋病毒的“门闩”：新研究揭示了阻止感染的关键当艾滋病病毒滑到人体细胞外进行对接并可能注入其致命的遗传密码时，会出现一个极其短暂的时刻，其表面的一小块突然打开，开始感染过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Unveiling-HIVs-latch-New-study-reveals-key-to-blocking-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Unveiling-HIVs-latch-New-study-reveals-key-to-blocking-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4ea73dd-8e3b-47dc-99bc-e1e9783c7378 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:26:06 -0500 Unveiling HIV's "latch": New study reveals key to blocking infection
CRISPR-Cas9基因编辑工具修复有缺陷的T细胞以治疗罕见的遗传性疾病一些遗传性基因缺陷会导致过度的免疫反应，这可能是致命的。马克斯德尔布吕克中心 Klaus Rajewsky 领导的研究人员在《科学免疫学》中报告称，使用 CRISPR-Cas9 基因编辑工具可以纠正此类缺陷，从而使免疫反应正常化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/CRISPR-Cas9-gene-editing-tool-repairs-defective-T-cells-to-treat-rare-hereditary-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/CRISPR-Cas9-gene-editing-tool-repairs-defective-T-cells-to-treat-rare-hereditary-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e1e1a5d-e653-4451-b5aa-4b494e2fb979 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 21:17:09 -0500 CRISPR-Cas9 gene-editing tool repairs defective T cells to treat rare hereditary disease
野生动物与人类交叉的可能性加剧了人们对慢性消耗性疾病的担忧每年秋天，北美各地数以百万计的猎人都会进入森林和草原猎杀鹿。冬天，人们会吃鹿肉排、香肠和用动物制成的汉堡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Possibility-of-wildlife-to- human-crossover-heightens-concern-about-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Possibility-of-wildlife-to- human-crossover-heightens-concern-about-chronic-wasting-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=092941c8-51c3-4b46-9c69-009610ad5955 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:32:32 -0500 Possibility of wildlife-to-human crossover heightens concern about chronic wasting disease
科罗拉多州法律解决方案将提高跨性别女囚犯的护理和住房标准塔莉娅·墨菲 (Taliyah Murphy) 于 2018 年初收到一封信，内容涉及一项即将提起的集体诉讼，该诉讼代表像她这样被关押在科罗拉多州男子监狱的​​跨性别女性提起。这给了她希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Colorado-legal-settlement-would-up-care-and-housing-standards-for-trans-women-inmates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240202/Colorado-legal-settlement-would-up-care-and-housing-standards-for-trans-women-inmates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b33cc1a-bdb1-4646-b14c-19279ef9e2c3 Fri, 02 Feb 2024 06:31:23 -0500 Colorado legal settlement would up care and housing standards for trans women inmates
